title: Velaiyilla Pattathari Lyrics Velaiyilla Pattathari Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Movie: Velaiyilla Pattathari
Song: Velaiyilla Pattathari
Music: Anirudh
Singer: Anirudh
Lyrics: Dhanush
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Velai Illa Pattadhari
thottuppaartha shock
adikkum veramaari.

indru mudhal
kaalargal thookkattum
kaalamellaam maarattum
thozhodu thozh seradaa.

Tholviyinil
vervaigal koodattum
vegam ellai meerattum
munnookki nee odadaa.

VIP Tea kada raja naanga
VIP naalaya Indiya  thaanga
VIP puriyaadha sarithiram naanga
VIP aamaa thimirudhaan ponga (2)

thadai,  aalai udai,
pudhu sarithiram padai
naalai namadhey.

vali, adhai oli,
pudhu vazhi pirandhidum
maattram urudhi  (2)

nooraaga, padai nooraadha
thotta idamellam thoolaaga.
neraaga vazhi neraaga
vellalaam thaaru maaraaga.

indru mudhal
kaalargal thookkattum
kaalamellaam maarattum
thozhodu thozh seradaa.

Tholviyinil
vervaigal koodattum
vegam ellai meerattum
munnookki nee odadaa.

VIP Tea kada raja naanga
VIP naalaya Indiya  thaanga
VIP puriyaadha sarithiram naanga
VIP aamaa thimirudhaan ponga (2)		 English Translation
I tried my best :)
an unemployed graduate
if you touch me- you’ll
get electric shock like anything

from today
lets raise our collar
let the time change
join shoulders together

with the loss
let it sweat high
let speed exceeds the limit
just run towards your goal.

VIP, we’re king of tea shop
VIP, we’re India’s future
VIP, we’re un understood history
VIP, yes its our rudeness

an obstacle, break it and
create a new history
tomorrow is yours.

pain, kill it
it will give you a new path
change is for sure.

like hundred army
break every single obstacle .
with justice
we can win all the way.

from today
lets raise our collar
let the time change
join shoulders together

with the loss
let it sweat high
let speed exceeds the limit
just run towards your goal.

VIP, we’re king of tea shop
VIP, we’re India’s future
VIP, we’re un understood history
VIP, yes its our rudeness
